item.title: Contact
item.description: Gmail: nick.b.ludwig PGP key PGP fingerprint: B5EC4A20F4A2F6FE242A2052531D8C9EFF7E9155

item.title: Slate Star Codex scrapes and ebooks
item.description: I’ve been reading Slate Star Codex for a few years now, and recently got a Kindle ereader. So naturally I thought it’d be a good idea to scrape SSC and convert the scrape into a set of ebooks. You can find the resulting code and scrape (as of 201122) at my Github or below. In particular, you will find a set of .docx files as well as some .mobi ereader format files.

item.title: Recently Read
item.description: Here’s a non-exhaustive list of some of the books I’ve enjoyed recently. If it’s on here, I’d recommend it! Sci-fi, including, Dune and sequels by F. Herbert, Lilith’s Brood by Butler, The Book of the New Sun by Wolfe, The Book of the Long Sun by Wolfe, History, including, The Martyrdom of Man by Reade, Dynasty by Holland, Philosophy, including, The Gay Science by Neitzsche, A Guide for the Perplexed by Schumacher, Non-fiction, including The Wealth of Nations by Smith, Animal Behavior by Alcock, Anarchy and the Law by Stringham.

item.title: Academic Paper Repository
item.description: A central place to store links and copies of the publications I’ve contributed to. ORCID: 000-0002-7345-659X Publications: N.B. Ludwig, Correlations and Self-Assembly in Ionic and Nematic Liquids pdf N.B. Ludwig, K. Weirich, E. Alster, T.A. Witten, M.L. Gardel, K. Dasbiswas, S. Vaikuntanathan. Nucleation and shape dynamics of model nematic tactoids around adhesive colloids JCP 149, 084901 (2020). pdf arXiv:1909.03481. V. Kamysbayev*, V. Srivastava*, N.B. Ludwig*, O.J. Borkiewicz, H. Zhang, J.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi! I’m Nick. These days, I’m employed by Remeeting, where I write code and think about ASR. In the past, I studied complex liquid systems using computer simulation techniques like molecular dynamics and Monte Carlo (my favorite). And before that, I studied chemistry! You can find some of my past work on my Github or here on my webpage. When I’m not working, I like to read, write, and hike. My reading interests are pretty broad.
